citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
During the inspection an infected right ear was found on an female Cavalier Spaniel named Zoe. The facility had not
identified the infection. The inside of the ear was slightly red and had moderate amounts of greasy brown exudate in the
ear canal and covering about 10 percent of the underside of the pinna.
Failure to perform adequate daily observations can lead to missed medical conditions that can progress without
treatment.
The facility must conduct daily observation of all the animals to assess their health and provide needed veterinary care.
Correction date: July 9, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(3) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
During the inspection an infected right ear was found on an female Cavalier Spaniel named Zoe. The facility had not 
identified the infection. The inside of the ear was slightly red and had moderate amounts of greasy brown exudate in the 
ear canal and covering about 10 percent of the underside of the pinna.  
Failure to perform adequate daily observations can lead to missed medical conditions that can progress without 
treatment.  
The facility must conduct daily observation of all the animals to assess their health and provide needed veterinary care. 
Correction date: July 9, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
